display.title: Docklands
display.description:
This is one of my favourite areas in Dublin. This is where the Celtic Tiger rose and changed the city: there are a lot of new and modern buildings in the area, nice restaurants and a very fancy theather: Bord Gais Energy Theather.

I had brunch here a few times and the area just looks amazing in the morning, it fills you up with energy and you are ready for a new day.
